metadata.title: RZ/A1 Group: “FreeRTOS package is not found” error on e2 studio

sections.content:
Question:
When I create a project for RZ/A1H, RZ/A1L, RZ/A1LC or RZ/A1LU with FreeRTOS selected, I get an error saying “FreeRTOS package is not found”.
Answer:
Each FreeRTOS software packages can be downloaded in each FreeRTOS Software Package Web pages
Please refer to the Getting Started Guide on the Software Package page for how to import into the IDE
RZ/A1H: https://www.renesas.com/en/software-tool/rza1h-freertos-software-package
RZ/A1L, RZ/A1LC, RZ/A1LU: https://www.renesas.com/en/software-tool/rza1lu-freertos-software-package
Suitable Products
RZ/A1H, RZ/A1L, RZ/A1LC, RZ/A1LU
When I create a project for RZ/A1H, RZ/A1L, RZ/A1LC or RZ/A1LU with FreeRTOS selected, I get an error saying “FreeRTOS package is not found”.
